title: Looking for some members for a ranked team
body:
Hey guys, 

I'm starting a new rank team and am currently trying to recruit some people. I am Silver 3 atm and would like people from Silver 5 upwards to join. Pls contact me on Lol if ur interested.

Also voice communications (skype, etc) would be useful to have.

Regards,
xXFongsterXx

replies.body: I have a smurf in S1 I would be happy to join if you intend to use voice communications (skype, etc)...
yea man add me and we can talk

Hi, I am a silver 3 Main support looking for a team
I also have a Silver 3 ADC main that I play with alot if you have space for 2 people.

I added you on LoL talk with you soon.
Calvin.
